revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sanho |model=CloudFTP |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/26/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless 'cloud' storage device |fcc_id=AXDWD700120319 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 MiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Shenzhen Ogemray Technology S1 |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3070 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=CloudFTP |default_ssid_regex=^CloudFTP$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/125911486/cloudftp-wirelessly-share-any-usb-storage-with-ipa Kickstarter page for the device]
"2011/11/4 and WG700-1" ''appears'' to be silkscreened on the main board. :"S1 Ver 1.0" and "RoHS" is silkscreened on the wireless module's board. It's presumed to be an '''Ogemray''' S1. :"2011/11/22WD700-PW1" appears to be silkscreened on the screen interface board.
The provider of the FCC EUT was kind enough to scrape off part numbers off of most important ICs on the board. At a glance, it '''seems''' to be using... *A '''Texas Instruments''' SoC (AM1806S?) *A '''Genesys Logic''' USB 2.0 hub (GL850G?)
The default SSID of '''CloudFTP''' is per the FCC manual.
